  • Uses of SnapshotTrigger in io.fluxzero.sdk.persisting.eventsourcing

    Classes in io.fluxzero.sdk.persisting.eventsourcing that implement SnapshotTrigger
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    enum 
    NoSnapshotTrigger
    A SnapshotTrigger implementation that never triggers snapshot creation.
    class 
    PeriodicSnapshotTrigger
    A SnapshotTrigger that triggers snapshot creation at fixed intervals based on the aggregate's sequence number.
